Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: HDR
Category.ToolTip: Groups all High Dynamic Range settings.
Category.Description: Groups all High Dynamic Range settings.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: GainOffset
Category.ToolTip: Groups all gain and offset settings.
Category.Description: Groups all gain and offset settings.

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that includes the LUT control features.
Category.Description: Category that includes the LUT control features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Transport layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Transport layer control features.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName1
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer 1 of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer 1 of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major Version of the Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.
Integer.Description: Major Version of the Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor Version of the Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.
Integer.Description: Minor Version of the Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Sub Minor Version of Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.
Integer.Description: Sub Minor Version of Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Enumeration.Name: Standby
Enumeration.ToolTip: Standby state
Enumeration.Description: Standby state

StructEntry.Name: StatusWaitForTrigger
StructEntry.ToolTip: If the camera waits for a trigger, this bit is set

StructEntry.Name: StatusTriggerTooFast
StructEntry.ToolTip: If the camera triggers too fast, this bit is set

StructEntry.Name: StatusWarningFfcOrBalanceOvf
StructEntry.ToolTip: Status warning FFC or balance overflow (input signal or parameters)
StructEntry.DisplayName: Status warning FFC or balance overflow

StructEntry.Name: StatusWarningFfcOrBalanceUdf
StructEntry.ToolTip: Status warning FFC or balance underflow (input signal or parameters)
StructEntry.DisplayName: Status warning FFC or balance underflow

Enumeration.Name: StatusScrollingDirection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Status scrolling direction.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the clock frequency to access from the device.

StructEntry.Name: StatusSensorPattern
StructEntry.ToolTip: If sensor pattern checking failed, this bit is set
StructEntry.Description: If sensor pattern checking failed, this bit is set

Enumeration.Name: DeviceSerialPortSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which device serial port to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which device serial port to control.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceSerialPortBaudRate
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature controls the baud rate used by the selected device's serial port.
Enumeration.Description: This feature controls the baud rate used by the selected device's serial port. Typical values listed should be used whenever possible. Arbitrary values can also be used by defining new enumeration entries.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor of the device.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: InputSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Input source
Enumeration.Description: Input source

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set signal source to CMOS sensor, processing chaine activated
EnumEntry.Description: Set signal source to CMOS sensor, processing chaine activated

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set signal source to A fixed pattern from CMOS sensor, processing chaine desactivated
EnumEntry.Description: Set signal source to A fixed pattern from CMOS sensor, processing chaine desactivated

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set signal source to rolled pattern from CMOS sensor, processing chaine desactivated
EnumEntry.Description: Set signal source to rolled pattern from CMOS sensor, processing chaine desactivated

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set signal source to B fixed pattern from CMOS sensor, processing chaine desactivated
EnumEntry.Description: Set signal source to B fixed pattern from CMOS sensor, processing chaine desactivated

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern, processing chaine desactivated
EnumEntry.Description: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern, processing chaine desactivated

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource5
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern + synchro generated inside FPGA, processing chaine desactivated
EnumEntry.Description: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern + synchro generated inside FPGA, processing chaine desactivated

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource6
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern + synchro generated inside FPGA + FPGA processing chaine activated
EnumEntry.Description: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern + synchro generated inside FPGA + FPGA processing chaine activated
EnumEntry.DisplayName: FPGA input pattern & FPGA Synchro & FPGA Processing

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource7
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern (Darkness 1 simulation) + synchro generated inside FPGA + FPGA processing chaine activated
EnumEntry.Description: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern (Darkness 1 simulation) + synchro generated inside FPGA + FPGA processing chaine activated
EnumEntry.DisplayName: FPGA input pattern Darkness1 & FPGA Synchro & FPGA Processing

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern (Darkness 2 simulation) + synchro generated inside FPGA + FPGA processing chaine activated
EnumEntry.Description: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern (Darkness 2 simulation) + synchro generated inside FPGA + FPGA processing chaine activated
EnumEntry.DisplayName: FPGA input pattern Darkness2 & FPGA Synchro & FPGA Processing

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource9
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern (Lightness simulation) + synchro generated inside FPGA + FPGA processing chaine activated
EnumEntry.Description: Set Signal Source to FPGA input pattern (Lightness simulation) + synchro generated inside FPGA + FPGA processing chaine activated
EnumEntry.DisplayName: FPGA input pattern Lightness & FPGA Synchro & FPGA Processing

EnumEntry.Name: InputSource10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Set signal source to CMOS sensor, processing chaine desactivated
EnumEntry.Description: Set signal source to CMOS sensor, processing chaine desactivated

Enumeration.Name: OutputMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Output mode
Enumeration.Description: Output mode

Enumeration.Name: OutputFrequency
Enumeration.ToolTip: Output frequency
Enumeration.Description: Output frequency

Enumeration.Name: SensorMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sensor mode
Enumeration.Description: Sensor mode

Enumeration.Name: MultiLineGain
Enumeration.ToolTip: Multi Line Gain
Enumeration.Description: Multi Line Gain

Enumeration.Name: ScanDirection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan direction
Enumeration.Description: Scan direction

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image. The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image. This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The AOI is applied after the flipping.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel provided by the device. It represents all the informations provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter but combined in one single value.

IntSwissKnife.Name: PixelFormatSW
IntSwissKnife.Formula: ((OUTPUTMODE = MEDIUM4OUTPUT12BITS) || (OUTPUTMODE = BASE2OUTPUT12BITS)) ? MONO12 : (((OUTPUTMODE = MEDIUM4OUTPUT10BITS) || (OUTPUTMODE = BASE2OUTPUT10BITS)) ? MONO10 : MONO8)

Enumeration.Name: PixelCoding
Enumeration.ToolTip: Coding of the pixels in the image.
Enumeration.Description: Coding of the pixels in the image. Raw gives the data in the native format of the sensor.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

IntSwissKnife.Name: PixelSizeSw
IntSwissKnife.Formula: PFR = MONO8 ? BITS8 : (PFR = MONO10 ? BITS10 : BITS12)

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.
Enumeration.Description: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum value that can be returned during the digitization process.
Integer.Description: Minimum value that can be returned during the digitization process. This corresponds to the darkest value of the camera. For color camera, this returns the smallest value that each color component can take.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum value that will be returned during the digitization process.
Integer.Description: Maximum value that will be returned during the digitization process. This corresponds to the brightest value of the camera. For color camera, this returns the biggest value that each color component can take.

IntSwissKnife.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMaxlSW
IntSwissKnife.Formula: PIXELSIZE = PIXELSIZE_8BITS ? MAX_8BITS : ((PIXELSIZE = PIXELSIZE_10BITS ) ? MAX_10BITS : MAX_12BITS)

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: White
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with the brightest possible image.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with the brightest possible image.

EnumEntry.Name: Black
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with the darkest possible image.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with the darkest possible image.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from top to bottom at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from top to bottom at each frame.

Enumeration.Name: HdrMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: High Dynamic Range mode selection
Enumeration.Description: High Dynamic Range mode selection

Enumeration.Name: HdrRatio
Enumeration.ToolTip: High Dynamic Range ratio selection
Enumeration.Description: High Dynamic Range ratio selection

Enumeration.Name: HdrExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: High Dynamic Range exposure mode selection
Enumeration.Description: High Dynamic Range exposure mode selection

Float.Name: HdrExposureProgrammed
Float.ToolTip: High Dynamic Range exposure programmed in us
Float.Description: High Dynamic Range exposure programmed in us

Float.Name: LinePeriodMin
Float.ToolTip: Controls the line period min(in us).
Float.Description: Controls the line period min (in us).

Enumeration.Name: SynchroMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Synchronisation mode
Enumeration.Description: Synchronisation mode

EnumEntry.Name: FreeRun
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Internal Line Trigger with Exposure Time Internally controlled
EnumEntry.Description: Internal Line Trigger with Exposure Time Internally controlled
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Internal Line Trigger with Exposure Time Internally controlled

EnumEntry.Name: ExtTrigExpVar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: External Line Trigger with Exposure Time Internally controlled
EnumEntry.Description: External Line Trigger with Exposure Time Internally controlled
EnumEntry.DisplayName: External Line Trigger with Exposure Time Internally controlled

EnumEntry.Name: ExtTrigExpMax
EnumEntry.ToolTip: External Line Trigger with Maximum Exposure Time
EnumEntry.Description: External Line Trigger with Maximum Exposure Time
EnumEntry.DisplayName: External Line Trigger with Maximum Exposure Time

EnumEntry.Name: ExtOneTrigExtExp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One External Line Trigger with Exposure Time Externally Controlled
EnumEntry.Description: One External Line Trigger with Exposure Time Externally Controlled
EnumEntry.DisplayName: One External Line Trigger with Exposure Time Externally Controlled

EnumEntry.Name: ExtTwoTrigExtExp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Two external Line Triggers with Exposure Time Externally Controlled
EnumEntry.Description: Two external Line Triggers with Exposure Time Externally Controlled
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Two external Line Triggers with Exposure Time Externally Controlled

EnumEntry.Name: FreeRunTintMax
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Internal Line Trigger with Maximum Exposure Time
EnumEntry.Description: Internal Line Trigger with Maximum Exposure Time
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Internal Line Trigger with Maximum Exposure Time

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Enumeration.Name: PreampGain
Enumeration.ToolTip: Preamp Gain
Enumeration.Description: Preamp Gain

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Integer.Name: RoiGainR
Integer.ToolTip: Set ROI and apply ROI Gain.
Integer.Description: Set ROI and apply ROI Gain.
Integer.DisplayName: Set ROI and apply ROI Gain.

Register.Name: LUTValueAll
Register.ToolTip: Accesses all the LUT coefficients in a single access without using individual LUTIndex.
Register.Description: Accesses all the LUT coefficients in a single access without using individual LUTIndex.

Category.Name: SaveRestoreLUT
Category.ToolTip: Groups all LUT settings bank save and restore.
Category.Description: Groups all LUT settings bank save and restore.

Enumeration.Name: LUTSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Current settings bank
Enumeration.Description: Current settings bank

Command.Name: LUTSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save LUT set into camera bank
Command.Description: Save LUT settings into camera bank

Command.Name: LUTSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Load LUT set from the selected bank
Command.Description: Load LUT from the selected bank

Enumeration.Name: CurrentLUTSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicate which LUT set is currently in use
Enumeration.Description: Indicate which LUT set is currently in use

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Enumeration.Name: ClConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: This Camera Link specific feature describes the configuration used by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: This Camera Link specific feature describes the configuration used by the camera. It helps especially when a camera is capable of operation in a non-standard configuration, and when the features PixelSize, SensorDigitizationTaps, and DeviceTapGeometry do not provide enough information for interpretation of the image data provided by the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: Base
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard base configuration described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard base configuration described by the Camera Link standard.

EnumEntry.Name: Medium
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard medium configuration described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard medium configuration described by the Camera Link standard.

EnumEntry.Name: Full
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard full configuration described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard full configuration described by the Camera Link standard.

EnumEntry.Name: Deca
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard Deca configuration with 10 taps of 8-bit, as described by the Camera Link Standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard Deca configuration with 10 taps of 8-bit, as described by the Camera Link Standard.

Enumeration.Name: ClTimeSlotsCount
Enumeration.ToolTip: This Camera Link specific feature describes the time multiplexing of the camera link connection to transfer more than the configuration allows, in one single clock.
Enumeration.Description: This Camera Link specific feature describes the time multiplexing of the camera link connection to transfer more than the configuration allows, in one single clock.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: This Camera Link specific device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a Camera Link camera as seen from the frame grabber or acquisition card.
Enumeration.Description: This Camera Link specific device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a Camera Link camera as seen from the frame grabber or acquisition card. Note the case of RGB where even though there are 3 color components, they are considered to be one tap (for instance, Camera Link specification defines 24-bit RGB as a single tap of 24 bits). This feature is mainly applicable to Camera link cameras.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting User set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting User set.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: CurrentUserSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicate which user set is currently in use
Enumeration.Description: Indicate which user set is currently in use

Enumeration.Name: CameraPrivilegeLevel
Enumeration.ToolTip: Camera privilege level.
Enumeration.Description: Camera privilege level.

Category.Name: ImageControl
Category.ToolTip: Allow to save an image or play stored image.
Category.Description: Allow to save an image or play stored image.

Float.Name: LowFilterWidth
Float.ToolTip: width of the low frequency filter applied for PRNU calibration
Float.Description: width of the low frequency filter applied for PRNU calibration

Enumeration.Name: FPNHdrSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select for HDR mode which line (top or bottom) is selected for FPNValueAll
Enumeration.Description: Select for HDR mode which line (top or bottom) is selected for FPNValueAll

Enumeration.Name: FFCHdrSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select for HDR mode which line (top or bottom) is selected for FFCValueAll
Enumeration.Description: Select for HDR mode which line (top or bottom) is selected for FFCValueAll

Enumeration.Name: FFCSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Current FFC bank selector
Enumeration.Description: Current FFC bank

Enumeration.Name: CurrentFFCSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicate which user FFC is currently in use
Enumeration.Description: Indicate which user FFC is currently in use

Enumeration.Name: PixelAccessLineNumber
Enumeration.ToolTip: Pixel access line number
Enumeration.Description: Pixel access line number

Enumeration.Name: ClampCompensation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Clamp compensation
Enumeration.Description: Clamp compensation

Integer.Name: SensorResetLevel
Integer.ToolTip: Sensor reset level of memory node

Integer.Name: SensorAntibloomingCurrentValue
Integer.ToolTip: Sensor Low TRA level for antiblooming Current Value

Enumeration.Name: SelfDiag
Enumeration.ToolTip: Self diag
Enumeration.Description: Self diag

EnumEntry.Name: FPGASensorSizeFailure
EnumEntry.ToolTip: If Fpga sensor size read failure, this bit is set

EnumEntry.Name: InvalidSensor0Detection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: invalid sensor 0 detection, this bit is set

EnumEntry.Name: InvalidSensor1Detection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: invalid sensor 1 detection, this bit is set

EnumEntry.Name: InvalidSensor2Detection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: invalid sensor 2 detection, this bit is set

EnumEntry.Name: InvalidSensor3Detection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: invalid sensor 3 detection, this bit is set

EnumEntry.Name: InvalidSensor6Detection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: invalid sensor 6 detection, this bit is set

EnumEntry.Name: InvalidSensor7Detection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: invalid sensor 7 detection, this bit is set

Command.Name: ResetFFCSensor
Command.ToolTip: Reset flat field sensor coefficient to 1
Command.Description: Reset flat field sensor coefficient to 1

Command.Name: FFCSensorSave
Command.ToolTip: Save all FFC sensor to FFC sensor file
Command.Description: Save all FFC sensor to FFC sensor file

Enumeration.Name: STB_Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Full Exposure Control Mode.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Full Exposure Control Mode.

Integer.Name: STB_Th_prog1
Integer.ToolTip: Threshold prog 1 for Stabilized Level Mode
Integer.Description: Threshold prog 1 for Stabilized Level Mode

Integer.Name: STB_Th_prog2
Integer.ToolTip: Threshold prog 2 for Stabilized Level Mode
Integer.Description: Threshold prog 2 for Stabilized Level Mode

Command.Name: EraseAll
Command.ToolTip: Reset all gain, offset and FFC for each sensor mode
Command.Description: Reset all gain, offset and FFC for each sensor mode

Command.Name: AnalogOffsetBalanceCalibrationAbort
Command.ToolTip: Abort analog offset balance calibration process
Command.Description: Abort analog offset balance calibration process

Command.Name: AnalogGainBalanceCalibrationAbort
Command.ToolTip: Abort analog gain balance calibration process
Command.Description: Abort analog gain balance calibration process

Integer.Name: FpgaDebug16BitsVal
Integer.ToolTip: Fpga Debug 16 bits coefficient value in decimal
Integer.Description: Fpga Debug 16 bits coefficient value in decimal
Integer.DisplayName: Fpga Debug 16 bits Value in decimal

IntReg.Name: FpgaDebug16BitsRegisterValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Fpga Debug 16 bits coefficient value in hexa
IntReg.Description: Fpga Debug 16 bits coefficient value in hexa
IntReg.DisplayName: Fpga Debug 16 bits Value in hexa

Enumeration.Name: SensorSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the 4K sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the 4K sensor.

Integer.Name: SensorDebug16BitsVal
Integer.ToolTip: Sensor Debug 16 bits coefficient value in decimal
Integer.Description: Sensor Debug 16 bits coefficient value in decimal
Integer.DisplayName: Sensor Debug 16 bits Value in decimal

IntReg.Name: SensorDebug16BitsRegisterValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Sensor Debug 16 bits coefficient value in hexa
IntReg.Description: Sensor Debug 16 bits coefficient value in hexa
